references.name: Felix Antonio Cortés Alfonso (Father)
references.reference: Sergio is a serious, responsible person, with moral, social and human principles, dedicated, intelligent, kind, with a desire to excel.

references.name: JT Turner (Coworker)
references.reference: I didn't work long with Sergio but he did an amazing job on some frontend changes for the company. He was coming into a codebase he didn't know with some very legacy code. He jumped right in and worked with other members even from other teams to get the work done. He also did all of this on a very fast timeline. He is a great frontend engineer and has a very good eye for the little details even when the designer misses them. He always went above and beyond on everything he worked on and was always game to work on whatever helped out the team the most.
